content.text:
Mr. MENENDEZ. Mr. President, I was unavailable for rollcall 
vote No. 274, on the nomination of Mark T. Esper, of Virginia, to be 
Secretary of the Army. Had I been present, I would have voted yea.
  Mr. President, I was unavailable for rollcall vote No. 275, on the 
nomination of David G. Zatezalo, of West Virginia, to be Assistant 
Secretary of Labor for Mine Safety and Health. Had I been present, I 
would have voted nay.
  Mr. President, I was unavailable for rollcall vote No. 276, on the 
motion to invoke cloture on Joseph Otting, of Nevada, to be Comptroller 
of the Currency. Had I been present, I would have voted nay.
content.speaker: Mr. MENENDEZ
